parts: Name this novella, in which a friend of Gabriel Utterson runs over a small girl in the street after drinking a serum.
The Strange Case of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde is by this Scottish author of Treasure Island.

After Dr Jekyll has a relapse and drinks the serum after a period of abstinence, he kills this kindly seventyyear-old Member of Parliament, and accidentally leaves half of his walking cane at the crime scene.
